cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on May 18, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2167, GI Bill National Emergency Extended Deadline Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SHERRILL:
H.R. 2167.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, clause 16 of the United
States Constitution.
[Page H1622]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: GI Bill National Emergency Extended Deadline Act
